alert.note: Alert for Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 22 at 10:46AM CST until February 25 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Noxubee River At Macon affecting Noxubee County. Tibbee Creek Near Tibbee affecting Clay County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Noxubee River At Macon. * WHEN...Until late Thursday night. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, Low land near the river is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 26.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to crest at 26.0 feet this afternoon. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Noxubee River Macon 26.0 26.0 Tue 10 am CS 26.8 25.5 22.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 7 PM CST.
